alert.note: Alert for Howell (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 10:01PM CDT until November 05 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR HOWELL COUNTY... At 1000 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Bakersfield to Viola to near Pineville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... West Plains, South Fork, Brandsville, Peace Valley, Lanton, White Church, Moody, Pottersville and Caulfield. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
